urls.title: The Environment Agency: Biodiversity Officer advertised with CJS
urls.description: Salary: £28,785 Location: Ceres House, 2 Searby Rd, LN2 4DT You’ll join our dedicated Fisheries, Biodiversity and Geomorphology team, who deliver technical advice on environmental protection, improvement and regulation. Much of our focus is on flood and coastal risk management works and environmental outcomes. Your role will shape the direction of the team in the Lincolnshire and Northamptonshire area, focusing on biodiversity advice and projects that deliver ecological outcomes. It’s about minimising ecological impacts from our own activities and delivering improved river, wetland and coastal habitats. You'll provide technical advice to internal customers on ecological issues while managing a range of exciting projects.
